name: Animepalm
overview:
Animepalm is one of the lead Dubbed Anime websites, housing over 1,200 Anime series, and 25,000 Episodes. Unlike most Anime websites, Animepalm offers both English Dubbed Anime, and English Subbed Anime, giving a variety for people to choose from.

Not only are they one of the fastest sites to get up Anime as it comes out; they also have an incredibly active community that helps the site grow.

Animepalm, along with being a large Anime Video site, is an Anime/Manga news website, as it reports daily on all the happenings related to Anime and Manga worldwide, from Manga sales, to the latest licensed Anime series.

Not satisfied with being a Stream and News site, Animepalm has strayed forward to offer Anime Openings and Endings, offer competitions, Anime clips, and more.

As more people begin to use Animepalm, it grows, and is soon to become one of the leading Anime websites on the internet.
